name: Kuinu's Coordination
desc:
As a response to a willing creature casting a spell that includes you as a target, you forge a connection of fire between you and the target creature. For the duration, you are immune to all of that creature's harmful spells. You take no damage and automatically succeed on all saving throws against their spells, suffering no adverse effects.

Apocalyptic spells ignore this spell's effect.
author: CrusaderDroid
